column1: Little Goat Diner////Food- we tried 4 things: the Mac and cheese was deliciously creamy with crispy Parmesan and breadcrumbs on top
column2: the fried pickles and onion rings were nice and light (tempura battered
column3: and sweet pickles if you're curious) and served with mustard and ranch dipping sauces
column4: the beef stew was just ok (underwhelming and too soupy
column5: to be honest) and the paratha burrito was very flavorful (but got soggy at the end
column6: because it was sitting on a bed of sauce)
